entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
